author: Lai Siu Chiu J:
casename: Yee Hong Pte Ltd v Tan Chye Hee Andrew (Ho Bee Development Pte Ltd, Third Party)
counsel: Edwin Lee (Rajah and Tann) for the plaintiff; Engelin Teh SC and Thomas Sim (Engelin Teh Practice LLC) for the defendant; Paul Sandosham (Wong Partnership) for the third party
tags-parsed: Arbitration/Stay of court proceedings/Whether court having jurisdiction to stay proceedings and order parties to arbitrate where no arbitration agreement between parties existing/Whether court should stay proceedings and order parties to arbitrate where prior related matter between similar parties referred to arbitration/Section 6(5) Arbitration Act (Cap 10, 2002 Rev Ed)
